headline: DTE Energy Foundation announces winners of first ever $300,000 Community Transformation Grant Program
summary: Twelve nonprofits across Michigan will receive a portion of the gran to help transform their communitiesDetroit, Nov. 25, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The DTE Energy Foundation announced today the winners of its first Community Transformation Grant Program, awarding $310,000 to 12 non-profit organizations across Michigan. This new initiative expands one of the Foundation’s core pillars of giving - Community Transformation. Since the program’s launch in March, the DTE Foundation has more than doubled
